title: Jahaun Jones Turns Himself in to Police
content:
The fifth and final suspect in the summer shooting that killed two Erie teens is now in police custody.
Erie Police tell Erie News Now Jahaun Jones turned himself in Sunday morning. He was arraigned then taken to the Erie County Prison.
Jones is one of five people charged in the fatal shooting of Elijah Jackson and Shakur Franklin. Both teens were 16-years-old when they were shot and killed at a house party near West 29th and Summit Streets in July.
